containerDefinitions.name: create-db
command: echo 'Creating appuser role (if not exists)...' && PGPASSWORD='1pq72qovvWr4z6dR3Qax76ikzukfRwZs' psql -h riches-reach-postgres.cmhsue8oy30k.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -p 5432 -U richesreach -d postgres -c "DO \$\$ BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_roles WHERE rolname='appuser') THEN CREATE ROLE appuser LOGIN PASSWORD 'StrongAppPass2025!'; END IF; END\$\$;" && echo 'Creating appdb database (if not exists)...' && PGPASSWORD='1pq72qovvWr4z6dR3Qax76ikzukfRwZs' psql -h riches-reach-postgres.cmhsue8oy30k.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -p 5432 -U richesreach -d postgres -c "SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname='appdb';" | grep -q '1 row' || PGPASSWORD='1pq72qovvWr4z6dR3Qax76ikzukfRwZs' psql -h riches-reach-postgres.cmhsue8oy30k.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -p 5432 -U richesreach -d postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE appdb OWNER appuser TEMPLATE template1;" && echo 'Granting privileges...' && PGPASSWORD='1pq72qovvWr4z6dR3Qax76ikzukfRwZs' psql -h riches-reach-postgres.cmhsue8oy30k.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -p 5432 -U richesreach -d appdb -c "GRANT ALL ON SCHEMA public TO appuser; ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES IN SCHEMA public GRANT ALL ON TABLES TO appuser; ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES IN SCHEMA public GRANT ALL ON SEQUENCES TO appuser;" && echo 'Testing connection as appuser...' && PGPASSWORD='StrongAppPass2025!' psql -h riches-reach-postgres.cmhsue8oy30k.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com -p 5432 -U appuser -d appdb -c "SELECT current_user, current_database();" && echo 'Database setup completed successfully!'
